title: Lion Brand Yarn Off the Hook Magic yarn, Rainbow Stripe
features: Lion Brand Yarn is the perfect yarn for knitting and yarn for crocheting!
Off the Hook Magic is a super plush chenille yarn innovatively spun with sturdy loops.
Care Instructions: Machine Wash and Dry.
Each skein weighs 3. 3 oz/95 g; Made in China.
description: No needles (or hooks) required! Off the Hook Magic is a super plush chenille yarn innovatively spun with sturdy loops. Simply pull one loop through another for a knit-look fabric. Each ball creates a square with a center motif. Choose from heart, star, emoji, and peace sign. Join squares together for a blanket that will have you looking like a knitting guru! Off The Hook Magic is the perfect way to get your kids involved in your yarn addiction.
